name: Izhetadore
description:
Play as Scug and explore a surreal world made up of AI backgrounds and populated by AI generated monsters. There's some secrets to be find so you'd better get looking.

There's some spooky elements to this game. Some bits of it may make you jump, but I don't really know if it's 'scary' or not.

You can certainly play this in HTML5, but the experience will not be that smooth due to the uncompressed assets (sorry). I recommend downloading one of the offline versions for the smoothest experience.

As usual I made all the sound effects and music.

I hope you enjoy it. It took like twenty days to make. Please check out the rest of SVGS Halloween Jam and also my other, better games.

Some slightly spoilery notes (but nothing too bad):

  • If you want to find out the big secret behind Izhetadore, you must fully explore the game world and find all the secrets. Then something will be revealed to you at the starting area.
  • Make sure to save before entering the new area – there are three endings to the game depending on your actions.
